captions.text: You'll never make it with the big boys in the big league.
You’ll never leave your little home town.
And you'll never make it overseas...
You'll never score with your head…
You'll never even stay on your feet.
And when you do go down, you'll never get back up.
You'll never win a FIFA Ballon d’Or.
And no way all of them.
Forget about them chanting your name.
Or wearing it on their backs.
And never the greatest player that’s ever lived.

comments.author: Roger Roth

comments.text:
Messi fan's don't get it. To be world champion for your country and to be 
champion for your club is a huge difference. Pele was champion for both his 
club and country. Pele scored 800 more goals then Messi and was by age 17 
already a world champion. With all Messi's glory he has never had the honor 
to be crowned world champion for Argentina. He and Cristiano Ronaldo are 
world class club players but lack the completeness of being a champion for 
their national teams. If Messi was as great as Pele, Argentina would have 
as many world titles as Brazil right now. I don't think anyone has ever 
been better than Pele. Pele scored more than 1284 goals, 95 goals for 
Brazil's national team, 12 goals in the World Cup. Pele could bicycle kick, 
head, dribble, fly in the air. Pele was a super athlete and perfect player. 
You take Messi, Maradona and Di Stefano which are Argentina's top 3 and 
they don't come even close to Pele. Since the 1970's Pele has remained the 
king of the sport in a undisputed matter. Pele who was named athlete of the 
20th century and Fifa player of the century holds various guinness world 
records as a player. He is the world's only 3 time world cup champion in 
history. Won more than 60 titles, 2 time Libertadores champion in South 
America, 2 time world club champion with Santos FC. 11 Time top goal scorer 
in Sao Paulo State championships, and 10 time state champion, 5 time Brazil 
National champion. No player in history has been able to beat Pele. Now 
even Brazil's top champions like Ronaldo, Romario, Mane Garrincha, Rivaldo, 
Kaka, Ronaldinho also have good arguments in topping Messi. Messi is not 
even fully considered 1 absolute in Argentina where Diego Maradona is 
considered the best player in Argentina's history.
comments.author: Roger Roth
